content:
ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute Class

Definition

This is a base type for attribute that sets the default service remoting provider to use for remoting the service interfaces defined and used in the assembly.

In this Article

[System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly)]
public abstract class ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute : Attribute
Inheritance
Attribute
ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute
Derived
FabricTransportServiceRemotingProviderAttribute
WcfServiceRemotingProviderAttribute
Attributes
System.AttributeUsage

Remarks

On service side, implementation of this attribute is looked up by and

            methods on the runtime to create a default  for the stateful and stateless services. 

            On client side, implementation of this attribute is looked up by 
             constructor to create a default
             when it is not specified.

            Note that on client side

            method create a default  once and hence the provider lookup happens
            only for the first time, after which the same provider is used.

            The order in which this attribute is looked up is as follows:

                    In the entry  obtained by calling method 
                    In the  that defines the remote interface for which listener or proxy is being created.

Constructors

ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute()

Initializes a new instance of the ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute class.

Methods

CreateServiceRemotingClientFactory(IServiceRemotingCallbackClient)

Creates a service remoting client factory that can be used by the ServiceProxyFactory to create a proxy for the remoted interface of the service.
CreateServiceRemotingListener(ServiceContext, IService)

Creates a service remoting listener for remoting the service interface.
